column4: I've created a new wireless connection in Networkmanager (U 10.04) and have connected my iPhone to it. However, I can't browse from my iPhone. Any clues?
then your iphone is not connecting , it's your laptop that has preceence with NM
are you trying to use the iphone as a gateway ?
Hum, I remeber one time I created a NM share and other laptops could connect to it with no problem. I think I was using Fedora back then (but that should be irrelevant)...
